opengraph.title: MonoGame Tutorials
opengraph.description: ManBeardGames is an indie game developer, web developer, and twitch streamer. These are tutorials written on game development

tutorials.title: 2D Camera
tutorials.short: How to create and implement a simple 2D camera for use in your projects

opengraph.title: 2D Camera
opengraph.description: How to create and implement a simple 2D camera for use in your projects

tutorials.title: AABB 2D Collision Checks
tutorials.short: How to create a simple check for 2D collision using Axis-Aligned Bounding Box (AABB)

opengraph.title: AABB 2D Collision Checks
opengraph.description: How to create a simple check for 2D collision using Axis-Aligned Bounding Box (AABB)

tutorials.title: Adding Content
tutorials.short: This tutorial briefly goes over adding content, such as images, sounds, and fonts, to your game using the Content Pipeline Tool and the ContentMangaer.

opengraph.title: Adding Content
opengraph.description: This tutorial briefly goes over adding content, such as images, sounds, and fonts, to your game using the Content Pipeline Tool and the ContentMangaer.

tutorials.title: Creating Scenes
tutorials.short: In this tutorial, we'll discuss creating the concept of Scenes in MonoGame

opengraph.title: Creating Scenes
opengraph.description: In this tutorial, we'll discuss creating the concept of Scenes in MonoGame

tutorials.title: Setting Up MonoGame
tutorials.short: How to setup your environment to get ready to make games with MonoGame

opengraph.title: Setting Up Monogame
opengraph.description: How to setup your environment to get ready to make games with MonoGame.

series.title: Scene-Entity-Component Series
series.short: In this series of tutorials, we'll learn to create Scenes in MonOGame, complete with transitions between scenes.  We'll then dive deeper and add entity-component management to the scenes.

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.short: Short introduction before we being the Scenes Tutorial Series

opengraph.title: Scenes Tutorial Series - Intorudciton
opengraph.description: Short intrudction before we begin the Scenes Tutorial Series

tutorials.title: Part 1 - The Scene Class
tutorials.short: In part 1, we disucss and create the Scene class. This is the foundation for everything else in this series.

opengraph.title: Scenes Tutorial Series - The Scene Class
opengraph.description: In part 1, we disucss and create the Scene class. This is the foundation for everything else in this series.

tutorials.title: Part 2 - Scene Manager
tutorials.short: In part 2, we discuss a couple of different ways to manage scenes and then use one of them; the Scene Manager class.

opengraph.title: Scenes Tutorial Series - Scene Manager
opengraph.description: In part 2, we discuss a couple of different ways to manage scenes and then use one of them; the Scene Manager class.

tutorials.title: Part 3 - Scene Transitions
tutorials.short: In part 3, we implement transition effects so that we're not just popping scenes in and out.

opengraph.title: Scenes Tutorial Series - Scene Transitions
opengraph.description: In part 3, we implement transition effects so that we're not just popping scenes in and out

tutorials.title: Part 4 - What Is Entity-Component
tutorials.short: In part 4, we discuss what is meant when we say entity-component.

opengraph.title: Scenes Tutorial Series - What Is entity Component
opengraph.description: In part 4, we discuss what is meant when we say entity-component.

tutorials.title: Part 5 - The Entity Class
tutorials.short: In part 5, we create the Entity class, the basis for all game objects in our scenes.

opengraph.title: Scenes Tutorial Series - The Entity Class
opengraph.description: In part 5, we create the Entity class, the basis for all game objects in our scenes.

tutorials.title: Part 6 - The Component Class
tutorials.short: In part 6, we create the Component class.

opengraph.title: Scenes Tutorial Series - The Component Class
opengraph.description: In part 6, we create the Component class.

tutorials.title: Part 7 - Keeping Track
tutorials.short: In part 7, we disucss how to keep track of all entities and components that have been created in our scenes.

opengraph.title: Scenes Tutorial Series - Keeping Track
opengraph.description: In part 7, we disucss how to keep track of all entities and components that have been created in our scenes.

tutorials.title: Part 8 - Wrap Up
tutorials.short: In part 8, we wrap up the discussion of our Scene, Entity, and Component classes and talk about extending them beyond this tutorial.

opengraph.title: Scenes Tutorial Series - Wrap Up
opengraph.description: In part 8, we wrap up the discussion of our Scene, Entity, and Component classes and talk about extending them beyond this tutorial.

tutorials.title: Part 9 - Demo Project
tutorials.short: In this final part, we use what we've created in this series to construct a demo project.

opengraph.title: Scenes Tutorial Series - Demo Project
opengraph.description: In this final part, we use what we've created in this series to construct a demo project.
